Title: Back to Mom's
Writer: Héctor Cabello Reyes (screenplay), Eric Lavaine (screenplay), Héctor Cabello Reyes (adaptation), Eric Lavaine (adaptation), Héctor Cabello Reyes (dialogue), Eric Lavaine (dialogue)
Actors: Josiane Balasko, Alexandra Lamy, Mathilde Seigner, Philippe Lefebvre
Plot: Stéphanie, a French architect in her early forties, has to return to her mother after loosing her job. Conflicts with her mother and her siblings ensue.
